snippet.title: Pikmin 3 Sunshine Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Pikmin 3 Sunshine is a mod for Pikmin 3 Deluxe which adds maps from Super Mario Sunshine as well as changes the enemies, treasures and music to reference Sunshine. It's currently still in developpment with a demo coming out soon!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey!! Im very very sorry for the delay on the Gelato video. I got really busy to get this trailer done and then kinda didnt want to work on it at all, i was a bit burned out is all.

But hey at least you can see a little bit of it there i guess, this trailer was made for ShaneMGD's fangame direct and it actually made it in!!

So yeah, enjoy the trailer, Gelato coming soon i promise and uuh join my discord (https://discord.gg/QdUU3sFN7B ) and follow my twitter (@HawksHacks )

And also subscribe blah blah blah have a good day.
